column4: Can someone help me with apache? People can't connect to the IP for some reason and I don't see why unless the port is being blocked by default or something
do you have a router or some other firewalls?
how you'r friends are trying to access your page?
through firefox / the internet? I don't really know how to answer that
i mean is their address correct, like http://your_ip nothing like www.ip.com etc
then i don't know what could possibly be wrong, except that port and maybe user access? (read and execute)
are you referring to port 78 or 80
i would use 80, but you just have to try which one works
i don't think i can help you anymore
but sure you can if you wan't to :D
